keyMoments.title: Luffy Commits to Ringing the Golden Bell
keyMoments.description: Captain Luffy declares his determination to ring the golden bell before Enel can take it, elevating the crew's mission beyond simply escaping Skypiea to fulfilling a 400-year-old promise.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Straw Hat Pirates' commitment to helping those they encounter, even when it's not directly their responsibility. This decision puts Luffy and his crew on the path to becoming heroes of Skypiea.
